CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 20, 1953, page 22, reads: "New Recipes - From her stage kitchen which was completely equipped with Crosley appliances by Pittsburgh Products Company, local distributor for the Crosley Division, Avco Manufacturing Corporation, Mrs. Mattie L. Handy, the Courier's nationally known economist, and her assistant, Miss Juanita Woods, demonstrates new recipies to hundreds of attentive homemakers."
TitMainTitle: Audience of men and women seated in front of stage with appliances and "Pepsi Cola" stand, at the 1953 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair in the Ammon Center
